typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Emp_sid as string,
		Emp_No as string,
		Emp_Name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as date,
		Actie as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
